reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress stylish with classy patterns and appreciate its versatility for various occasions. The dress is comfortable and features a loose fit, with one customer noting it hits at about the knees. The material quality receives mixed feedback - while some praise the fabric, others find it cheap and thin. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some finding it true to size while others say it runs big. The dress is see-through according to multiple reviews. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress!
items.body: Love this dress! Casual yet classy dress. The material is see through, so I had to wear an under slip which was fine. My top size is 10/12 or medium. I ordered a size medium and it fit good. It was a little snug when I tried to stretch my arms, so I was careful not to stretch or reach too far or high. I’m 5’5”, 173# and the medium size was a good fit for me. Read more
items.author: Hope Y Gomez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely Stunning - Exceeded Expectations!
items.body: I am so thrilled with this dress! It truly looks way better on than it does in the package. The moment I put it on, I was impressed by how incredibly flattering it is. It drapes beautifully and highlights all the right areas. Beyond just looking great, and being lightweight (but not see - through), it's also extremely comfortable – I could wear it all day! I've already received so many compliments every time I've worn it. This dress is definitely a new favorite in my wardrobe. Highly recommend! For reference - I’m 5’5, 130 lbs and I purchased a small. Read more
items.author: BACON237

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soooooo CUTE
items.body: This dress could not be cuter. The pattern is very cool. It’s thin lightweight comfortable over my large chest. The only issue is the material is very wrinkled. I’m gonna have to see if I can throw in the dryer with some wet clothes or possibly iron which I don’t really like to do lol I’m lazy girl. Read more
items.author: Daryl Brantley Allder

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy cute can machine wash and hang to dry.
items.body: Just a perfect lightweight casual comfy run errands dress. Nice it doesn’t button all the way down as that has been an issue on other dresses. Bought 5 different pattern and love them all. Machine wash and then hang to dry. Read more
items.author: karen maston

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thin & poly but print will photograph nicely. Vibrant colors.
items.body: It's okay. Print is vibrant. Small was VERY generous in size. Wish it felt less polyester, thin fabric...but would photograph nicely due to attractive print. Read more
items.author: Sarah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: Perfect dress. Hides numbs because it’s loose and flows. Looks more expensive than it really is. Would buy again. I got many compliments. Read more
items.author: Lisa J.

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not as expected
items.body: Thin material and too wide of fit. I would have returned it but missed the window of time. Read more
items.author: Maureen

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: Cute cut and pattern, cheap material, but you get what you pay for. I would order more but I don’t love the other patterns. Great casual dress for warm weather. I ordered a small, I’m 130 and 5’5” Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Z-blue White Flowers, Z-pink Red Hearts, Z-bright Green Floral, Green Tribe, Z-bright Blue Floral, Z-green Plaid, Z-turquoise Paisley, Z-deep Blue Flowers, Z-black Patterns, Z-pure Black, Z-cyan Tribe, Z-sky Blue, Blue Tribe, Z-black White Grid. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
